title: AuditNOW
description:
AuditNOW is brand monitoring software that allows your brand to conduct unlimited fleet audits using AI.

Our model detects critical details from images, such as measuring the wheelbase, determining the year of manufacture (YOM) and scanning for brand damages — providing detailed insights with minimal effort.

AuditNOW also leverages AI to ensure brand consistency, reducing manual tasks and streamlining operations.
